references.paper_title: Retrieval-augmented generation for knowledge-intensive NLP tasks
references.reason: This paper introduces the core concept of Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), a technique that is central to the work presented in this paper.

references.paper_title: Dense passage retrieval for open-domain question answering
references.reason: This paper introduces dense passage retrieval, a key retrieval technique used in many RAG systems and is directly relevant to this paper's approach.

references.paper_title: Natural Questions: A benchmark for question answering research
references.reason: This paper introduces the Natural Questions dataset, which is used as a benchmark in evaluating the performance of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: HotpotQA: A dataset for diverse, explainable multi-hop question answering
references.reason: This paper introduces the HotpotQA dataset, another benchmark dataset used in evaluating the performance of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Chain-of-thought prompting elicits reasoning in large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces chain-of-thought prompting, which inspires the chain-of-retrieval strategy used in the proposed method.
